wikipedia_page.main:
Chris Davis is a British singer and guitarist in Nottingham-based shoegaze band Spotlight Kid, as well as a drummer with Six By Seven.  
Davis has also stood in on drums for Spiritualized in 2002 when Kev Bales fell ill.In 2009, Davis toured with Soulsavers and Mark Lanegan on the Depeche Mode European Tour.

response: Six by Seven (also written as SIX.BY SEVEN or six.by seven or six.byseven) are an English indie rock band, formed in 1992 in Nottingham. The classic lineup of the band featured singer/guitarist Chris Olley, guitarist Sam Hempton, drummer Chris Davis, bassist Paul Douglas and keyboard player James Flower.

link_mentions.page: The Way I Feel Today (Six by Seven album)

response: Spotlight Kid are an English, Nottingham-based shoegaze band, whose original line-up was Six By Seven drummer Chris Davis on drums, Rob McCleary & Katty Heath (formerly of Bent) on vocals, Karl Skivington on mouth organ, Chris Moore on guitars and Matt Holt on bass.
Christopher or Chris Davis may refer to:
* Chris Davis (running back) (born 1979), American football fullback
* Chris Davis (wide receiver, born 1983), American football wide receiver
* Chris Davis (wide receiver, born 1984), American football wide receiver
* Chris Davis (baseball) (born 1986), Major League Baseball player
* Chris Davis (fighter) (born 1982), American mixed martial artist
* Chris Davis, Canadian ice hockey player  drafted by the Buffalo Sabres in 1993
* Chris Davis (politician) (born 1953), Liberal National Party of Queensland politician
* Chris Davis (musician), British singer and guitarist
* Chris Davis, guitarist for the band Texas in July
